sn35.111:1.1: “Cakkhum, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.111:1.6: manam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.111:1.7: Cakkhunca kho, bhikkhave, abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya …pe…
sn35.111:1.10: manam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
